title: Class Pets
description: Does your classroom have a class pet? Class Pets describes a variety of engaging activities students can do with a pet in their classroom. Colorful illustrations and a repetitive text structure support early emergent readers. The book can be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose and connect to prior knowledge.
